features: Hierarchical notes: Organize notes in nested folders and categories for structured knowledge management.
Markdown editor: Write and format notes using markdown with live preview.
Tag system: Categorize notes with tags for flexible organization and quick filtering.
Full-text search: Find notes instantly with fast search across titles, content, and tags.
Version history: Track changes and restore previous versions of notes.
Note linking: Create connections between related notes with wiki-style links.
Attachments: Upload and embed files, images, and documents within notes.
Templates: Create reusable note templates for consistent formatting and structure.
Export options: Export notes as markdown, HTML, or PDF for sharing and archiving.
Collaborative editing: Share notes with team members for real-time collaboration.
Dark mode: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable reading.
Mobile access: Access and edit notes from mobile devices with responsive design.
